+
+// This task removes the non-tranformed build jar from the build image.
+// The transformed jar remains published.  Remote or disable this task 
+// when modifying this project to build the yasson release artifact 
+// acquired from maven central.
+task retractWLPJars(type: Delete) {
+    dependsOn publishWLPJars
+
+    FileTree tree = fileTree(dir: buildImage.file('wlp/lib'))

nodes.bodyText: Do we have some sort of issue to track enabling all of the skipped tests once cdi-3.0 is available? If we just have this TODO comment in the code I worry that it will be forgotten.
@aguibert We have an issue to track all remaining work, #11633.  We'll need to modify it slightly once this PR merges in its final state.
Can you add a comment indicating why this test is being skipped for EE9 features?
can you include a comment indicating why these tests are skipped?
This implies the transformer tool isn't renaming META-INF/service/javax.* files to their jakarta.*, is there an issue open on the transformer tool to track that?
Yes.  I opened issue tbitonti/jakartaee-prototype#97 to document and track this problem.
